
name(Lost in 4D Again)

snap(-10,10,20)
sky(91,188,252)
fog(255,209,140)
ground(150,185,192) //ground(r,g,b,textureNum,addedHueChangeFactor,addedSatChangeFactor)
lightswingX(-10)
distfog(11700)
addon(1)

tip(This stage will put all your mad skills to the test!)
tip(It also has sneaky four dimensional shortcuts across time)
tip(which take you from one checkpoint to the next much faster;)
tip(study the stage carefully to find them!)
tip(Good luck!)

nlaps(1)

soundtrack(lost4d,mp3)
noarrow()
